Additional Scope Comments: IHS is a component agency within the Department of Health and Human Services. Cutoff of email will by by employee tenure. Transfer records when 15 years old.
Legacy Email Scope: Agency will be including legacy e-mail for all items being used, dating back to approximately 2000.

Agency Records Officer: Christopher Forney, IHS Records Management Officer
Senior Agency Official: Colleen Barros, Acting Assistant Secretary for Administration

Additional Scope Comments: All agency email in all accounts will be managed using GRS6.1 items 010 and 011.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer to NARA 15 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: The Capstone approach will be applied to legacy email starting in 2011 when USDA and its components implemented ProofPoint. Prior to 2011, USDA applied a print and file policy to email. Extant legacy email prior to 2011 is inaccessible and will be scheduled for disposal on a separate Request for Disposal Authority.
